product_name: Seirus Xtreme All Weather Edge Mittens - Women's
long_description: The Seirus Xtreme All Weather(TM) Edge mittens are 100% waterproof and insulated with Thinsulate polyester fibers to keep your hands dry and warm on winter outings. Xtreme waterproof, breathable inserts keep your hands dry on winter adventures. 100g Thinsulate(R) insulation keeps your hands toasty while you ski and hike. Grab hold of your ski poles with the grippy leather palms. The Seirus Xtreme All Weather(TM) Edge mittens have a formfitting design that allows for great dexterity.
short_description: The Seirus Xtreme All Weather(TM) Edge mittens are 100% waterproof and insulated with Thinsulate polyester fibers to keep your hands dry and warm on winter outings.
